home.title: Misers of the Galaxy
home.titlehome: Dear stingy, grigous and other flu-sous, welcome !
home.subtitle:
Are you tired of spending 3 hours getting lost from website to website, eyeing articles that are far too expensive for what they are?
Same for us ! That's why our site offers you excellence, and will satisfy even the stingest person of the whole galaxy.
Cosmically yours, The Team.
